text: Roger Zatkoff (March 25, 1931 - November 10, 2021) was an American football player and businessman. He was born in Hamtramck, Michigan. He played as a linebacker and defensive end. His career lasted from 1953 until 1958. He played for the Detroit Lions and Green Bay Packers. Zatkoff died on November 10, 2021 at the age of 90.Roger Zatkoff, starter on Detroit Lions' 1957 championship team, dies at 90 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American football linebackers Category:American football defensive ends Category:Detroit Lions players Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Businesspeople from Detroit Category:Sportspeople from Detroit
title: Roger Zatkoff
